cooperation_about_description_1: Bankimonline is the leading platform for comparing mortgages and financial products in Israel.
cooperation_about_description_2: We help clients find the best mortgage for them, saving time and money.
cooperation_about_description_3: Join our partner network and be part of the financial revolution in Israel.
cooperation_cta_description: Join our partner program today and start earning
cooperation_cta_title: Become our partner and earn together with us
cooperation_earning_bonus_desc: Earn additional bonuses for achieving monthly and quarterly goals.
cooperation_earning_commission_desc: Receive commission for every client who makes a transaction through you. Commission rates vary by transaction type and volume.
cooperation_earning_targets_desc: Set personal goals and receive full support to achieve them from our professional team.
cooperation_step1_desc: Submit an application for the partner program through our website
cooperation_step2_desc: A representative from our team will contact you to schedule a meeting
cooperation_step3_desc: We'll sign a partnership agreement defining terms and commissions
cooperation_step4_desc: You'll receive tools and support for efficient client referrals
cooperation_step5_desc: You'll receive monthly payments for clients you referred
cooperation_subtitle: Earn 500₪ for every customer you refer who purchases our services. Register now!
marketplace_description: Bankimonline provides its clients and partners with a single digital service for all types of lending
one_click_mortgage: Pick a mortgage in one click
referral_description: Earn a commission for every client who purchases our services
referral_title: Bring a client and get 500 ₪ reward
